thread.title: BRIEF-Oriental Bank Of Commerce Says Dwarks Das Seth International & Dwarka Das Seth SEZ India Accounts Turned NPA

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Oriental Bank Of Commerce Says Dwarks Das Seth International & Dwarka Das Seth SEZ India Accounts Turned NPA

organizations.name: reuters) - oriental bank of commerce ltd

text:
Feb 26 (Reuters) - Oriental Bank Of Commerce Ltd:
* SAYS CLARIFIES THAT ACCOUNTS OF DWARKS DAS SETH INTERNATIONAL & DWARKA DAS SETH SEZ INDIA TURNED NPA IN 2014
* TOTAL EXPOSURE ON ACCOUNTS FULLY PROVIDED FOR; THERE WILL BE NO ADDITIONAL IMPACT ON PROFITABILITY OF BANK Source text - bit.ly/2CHapYR Further company coverage:
